Text:
Gday
Thanks for the great download,
i dont seem to be able to get this train to movie in railworks 4 done everything as the manual said but wont move please help

We are aware of this issue and are trying to fix the problem. Can you please tell us what version of Railworks you are running, Train Simulator 2012 or Train Simulator 2013 either in the comments or on www.railworkscentral.com. Please be patient and we will let you know as soon as we have a fix.

Team TPB_4_Ever

Thanks Mate
I'm running train simulator 2013, have tried it on railworks  2012 as well dont work on either.
thanks

IiTraxiI has very kindly allowed us to share this torrent, This works perfectly fine and fixes all errors.

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7832253/Train_Simulator_2013_-_Class_57_Rail_Tour

Thank you very IiTraxiI

Team TPB_4_Ever

Thanks IiTraxiI and thank you for fixing 
Very best wishes

cant move the train, in IiTraxiI fix also, please help.

Thanks!
Hello.Can I use Railworks 3 addons on Railworks 4"?I saw that TS2013 uses a different type of scripts(.lua).Do I have to change every script before installing them?

Sunny you have to put key in ignition then move lever on left hand side (break) to get moving.
this has got to be the slowest train ive ever driven takes forever to get any speed.
